title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: AdLunam’s mission is to democratize Web3 investing which involves building relationships with like-minded projects to build the diverse future of Web3 collectively. As a company, AdLunam is pioneering different business use cases for NFTs, including dynamic NFT investor profiles and NFT allocation fractionalisation.Sounds interesting, right?Learn more: https://adlunam.cc

comments.author: Emitdama
comments.body: Quote from: sagarbansal21 on January 24, 2023, 04:24:22 AMAdLunam’s mission is to democratize Web3 investing which involves building relationships with like-minded projects to build the diverse future of Web3 collectively. As a company, AdLunam is pioneering different business use cases for NFTs, including dynamic NFT investor profiles and NFT allocation fractionalisation.Sounds interesting, right?Though it sounds interesting, I feel like the website UX looks too static to me for a good project with such interesting concept, shall we expect more improved version to be released? (I was about to bookmark but will do later on based upcon how big this will grow in coming days).Are you just introducing this to our community or do you have your role in this project? Also, I've never seen Proof of Attention consensus mechanism being used much. Maybe this could be the "thing" for all magic needed for the success. Let's see how it goes..

comments.author: maxtra
comments.body: Quote from: sagarbansal21 on January 24, 2023, 04:24:22 AMAdLunam’s mission is to democratize Web3 investing which involves building relationships with like-minded projects to build the diverse future of Web3 collectively. As a company, AdLunam is pioneering different business use cases for NFTs, including dynamic NFT investor profiles and NFT allocation fractionalisation.Sounds interesting, right?Learn more: https://adlunam.ccInteresting. What specific strategies and partnerships does AdLunam plan to implement in order to effectively democratize Web3 investing and bring about a diverse future for the Web3 ecosystem through building relationships with other like-minded projects?
